lede: Annual estimates of the size of the UK “usually resident population” are calculated at the mid-year point (30 June). The ONS compile and publish the UK estimates using estimates for England and Wales (produced by ONS directly), estimates for Scotland (produced by National Records of Scotland) and estimates for Northern Ireland (produced by the Northern Ireland Statistics & Research Agency).
